fever.en: Fever is a temporary rise in body temperature. Drink plenty of fluids and rest. If it lasts more than 3 days, consult a doctor.

cold.en: Common cold causes runny nose, sneezing, and sore throat. Drink warm fluids and rest. Usually recovers in 7 days.

cough.en: Cough can be due to infection or allergy. Drink warm water, avoid cold foods, and see a doctor if persistent.

dengue.en: Dengue is spread by Aedes mosquitoes. Symptoms include high fever, body pain, and rash. Avoid self-medication and consult a doctor immediately.

malaria.en: Malaria is spread by Anopheles mosquitoes. Use mosquito nets and repellents. Seek medical help if you have fever with chills.

chikungunya.en: Chikungunya causes fever and severe joint pain. Spread by Aedes mosquitoes. Drink fluids and consult a doctor.

typhoid.en: Typhoid spreads through contaminated food and water. Symptoms include fever, abdominal pain, and weakness.

cholera.en: Cholera spreads through dirty water. Drink clean, boiled water and maintain hygiene.

diarrhea.en: Diarrhea leads to watery stools and dehydration. Drink ORS and fluids. Consult a doctor if severe.

jaundice.en: Jaundice causes yellowing of eyes and skin. Often linked to liver problems. Avoid oily food and consult a doctor.

covid.en: COVID-19 spreads through droplets. Wear mask, wash hands, and get vaccinated.

asthma.en: Asthma causes difficulty in breathing. Avoid dust, smoke, and always carry inhaler if prescribed.

tuberculosis.en: TB is an infectious disease affecting lungs. Symptoms: persistent cough, fever, weight loss. Treatment is free in India.

anemia.en: Anemia is low hemoglobin in blood. Eat iron-rich foods like spinach, jaggery, and beans.

heatstroke.en: Heatstroke happens when body loses water. Drink ORS, coconut water, and fluids.

dehydration.en: Dehydration happens when body loses water. Drink ORS, coconut water, and fluids.

snakebite.en: For snakebite, keep patient still and rush to hospital. Do not try home remedies.

burns.en: For minor burns, put cool water. Do not apply toothpaste or oil. Severe burns need hospital care.

fracture.en: Fracture is a broken bone. Immobilize the area and go to hospital immediately.

menstrual_hygiene.en: Use clean sanitary pads or menstrual cups. Change every 4-6 hours to prevent infection.

nutrition.en: Eat a balanced diet with cereals, pulses, vegetables, fruits, and milk daily.

vitamin_d.en: Vitamin D is important for bones. Sunlight in morning is best source.

iron_deficiency.en: Iron deficiency leads to weakness. Eat jaggery, spinach, beetroot, and pulses.

handwashing.en: Wash hands with soap for at least 20 seconds before eating and after toilet use.

vaccination.en: Vaccines protect against diseases like polio, measles, and COVID. Get vaccinated on time.

eye_care.en: Avoid rubbing eyes. Wash with clean water if irritation occurs. Use spectacles if advised.

ear_care.en: Do not use sharp objects in ears. If pain or discharge, consult a doctor.

toothache.en: Toothache may be due to cavity. Rinse mouth with warm salt water and see a dentist.

oral_hygiene.en: Brush twice daily and floss regularly to maintain oral hygiene.

hypertension.en: High BP increases risk of heart disease. Eat low-salt diet and exercise regularly.

diabetes.en: Diabetes causes high sugar levels. Eat healthy, exercise, and take medicines on time.

obesity.en: Obesity increases risk of diabetes and heart disease. Eat less junk food and stay active.

heart_attack.en: Heart attack symptoms: chest pain, sweating, shortness of breath. Call emergency immediately.

stroke.en: Stroke symptoms: face drooping, arm weakness, speech difficulty. Rush to hospital immediately.

allergy.en: Allergy causes sneezing, rash, or breathing problems. Avoid allergens and consult doctor.

food_poisoning.en: Food poisoning causes vomiting and diarrhea. Drink fluids and consult doctor if severe.

skin_infection.en: Skin infections cause redness, itching, or boils. Keep area clean and use prescribed cream.

heat_rash.en: Heat rash appears in hot weather. Wear cotton clothes and stay cool.

depression.en: Depression causes sadness and loss of interest. Talk to loved ones and seek professional help.

anxiety.en: Anxiety causes restlessness and worry. Relaxation techniques and counseling help.

yoga.en: Yoga improves flexibility, strength, and mental health. Practice daily for 30 minutes.

sleep.en: Adults need 7-8 hours of sleep. Maintain a regular sleep routine.

water_intake.en: Drink 8-10 glasses of water daily to stay hydrated.

outbreaks.en: None as of now (this will later connect to govt dataset).
